creator: EduGorilla Test Series 4
descriptionHtml:
Preparing for IPM Exam? Download the No. 1 Vernacular Test Series app #EduGorilla and get:
- 17,201+ mocks for 550+ competitive exams
- Questions that you would probably get in IPM Exam
- A multitude of IPM mocks, sectional tests, and previous year papers
- Tests in both English and Hindi

About IPM:
Launched by IIM Indore in 2011, the five-year Integrated Programme in Management (IPM) is the first of its kind in India. The program has been accredited by the Association of MBAs, London (4th and 5th Year). It is a unique and creative program meant for young students with managerial and leadership aspirations. Through IPM, IIM Indore seeks to attract young students and mold them as outstanding leaders through world-class education. You can practice mock tests of IPM online and achieve success.

IPM App Details:

• IPM mock test app helps to prepare for quantitative aptitude and verbal ability by providing questions based on the latest exam pattern
• IPM series provides syllabus wise unique questions
• IPM test series by EduGorilla also helps to prepare for IPM with latest questions
• Previous year papers and mock tests are also provided for better practice of IPM

IPM Online Test Series:

Practice IPM series that are specially designed keeping in mind the level of IPM. All the mock tests are based on the updated exam pattern and can be accessed 24x7 online.

In IPM Mock Test:

Get more than 10 Mock Tests for. The test series get updated on a regular basis. You will get new mock tests for IPM that can be accessed online anywhere anytime. Sectional tests and topic wise mock tests are also given to help you practice more.

Key Features of EduGorilla’s IPM Test Series:

EduGorilla offers a lot of features in its IPM test series –

• More than 10 mock tests and sectional tests mock tests available
• 24×7 Online Access
• Personalized Performance Analysis of your mock test with your All India & State Rank
• Online Mock Tests as per the latest pattern; Section-wise test paper of quantitative aptitude and verbal ability

Subjects Covered:

Quantitative aptitude - Number system, LCM & HCF, percentage, quadratic equations, binomial theorem, functions, mensuration, permutation and combination, probability, simple interest and compound interest.
Verbal ability - Vocabulary, reading comprehension, grammar, sentence rearrangement, correct usage of words and phrases, verbal analogies.

Alerts and Updates:

Now practice EduGorilla IPM series on the go! Get regular alerts and latest updates of IPM like exam notifications, important dates, syllabus, etc.

Practice mock tests, and various online topic-wise tests on the EduGorilla IPM App.
descriptionShort: Practice the best test series for IPM only on EduGorilla IPM App

creator: EduGorilla Test Series 4
descriptionHtml:
Integrated Program in Management Aptitude Test (IPMAT) is an aptitude test conducted by the IIM Indore to select students for various five-year courses. Therefore to assist the students with their exam preparation, EduGorilla has introduced IPMAT IIM Indore Exam Preparation App.

Special Features 🤩 of EduGorilla's IPMAT IIM Indore Exam Preparation App
👉 Accessible 💻 24*7 from any & all devices
👉 Latest pattern Mock Tests 📖 & Current Affairs 📖 present in IPMAT IIM Indore practice exam App
👉 25+ Mock Tests ⏳ with questions as per the latest exam pattern
👉 Smart user-interface that saves 40% of study time ⏱️
👉 Daily News 📖 provided for the latest issues
👉 Relevant Current Affairs 📖 for the exams
👉 Reminders for Regular Exam Updates 📖
👉 Daily Quiz ⏳ to test your preparation
👉 Detailed analysis 💡 and performance comparison 🤟 on All-India & State-Level basis
👉Accessible in English✍️
👉 The best online exam preparation app available at modest price 🤩

IPMAT IIM Indore Exam Preparation App Details
The IPMAT IIM Indore Online Mock Test App consists of all the exam details along with the online test series and study materials which are necessary to crack the exam. We have given special emphasis on tougher and vital topics that require more caution. We also render a user-friendly interface to promote efficient and effective learning.
Taking a routine online test series on our IPMAT IIM Indore practice exam app helps the students to improve their time management. It also helps the students to master the fear of writing exams and enhances the problem-solving abilities of students. We arrange doubt clearing classes for the students who wish to understand the concepts clearly and easily. Thus with all these essential features, our IPMAT IIM Indore mock test app is one of the best online learning apps for the students to crack the exam with flying colors.

Subjects Covered in IPMAT IIM Indore
👉 Quantitative Aptitute (MCQ)
👉 Quantitative Aptitute (Short Answer)
👉 Verbal Ability

IPMAT IIM Indore Exam Pattern
👉 Mode of Exam: Offline
👉 Duration: 120 Minutes
👉 No.of Questions: 100
👉 Maximum Marks: 400

About Us
EduGorilla’s team of experts is driven to make the best mock test series apps for students. We provide the best exam preparation apps at a modest price to help all students in preparation for various exams. EduGorilla’s best online exam preparation apps provide keen insight into the latest exam pattern. Therefore, get our apps today to get the best mock tests.

Alerts & Notifications-
Start your preparation today with one of the Best Online Learning Apps, anytime & at any place.
Get the latest alerts, like, Exam Notification, Admit Card, & Results, etc.
Start preparing today on EduGorilla: India’s Best Mock Test App.

Contact Details-
We are eager to help you. Feel free to contact us at support@edugorilla.com

descriptionHtml:
EduGorilla App is catering to the educational needs of lakhs of applicants preparing for their desired exams in various categories. It offers virtual learning experience with up-to-date test series of Management Exams with an aim to provide conceptual clarity about exam relevant topics to applicants. Therefore, we have introduced our IPM (IIM-Indore) Exam Preparation app with an aim to assist applicants with their IPM (IIM-Indore) exam preparation. The IPM (IIM-Indore) preparation app allows them to crack IPM (IIM-Indore) with good scores.

About Us
EduGorilla operates in Omnichannel distribution mode. Its top - notch content & round-the-clock technical support is helping 4 Cr+ applicants in cracking their desired competitive exam with the success rate of 16X and fulfilling their dreams. Through our AI and ML based workflow, we ensure greater chances of success for applicants for over 1400 exams.

EduGorilla's expert team creates top-notch & most up-to-date content for mock test series on App to cater applicants' educational needs. Our exam preparation apps provide in-depth knowledge about exam-relevant topics & latest exam patterns to all applicants at an affordable price, with a special focus on tier 2,3 cities.

Special Features of EduGorilla's Mock Tests
-> Top-notch Content
-> Well Researched Content
-> Topic-wise Exam Preparation
-> Exam-centric Mock Tests
-> Detailed Explanations to Each Question
-> Previous Year Question Papers
-> 24/7 accessible from any device & at any time
-> Smart user-interface that saves your study time
-> Reminders for regular exam updates
-> Accessible in Multiple Languages
-> Daily current affairs & quiz with real-time test experience
-> Performance Analysis at All-India & State Levels through AI & ML

IPM (IIM-Indore) App Details
The IPM (IIM-Indore) mock test app covers all of the important exam details based on the most recent exam pattern. For applicants, our user-friendly interface is simple to understand. IPM (IIM-Indore) Exam Preparation App contains the most probable questions to appear in the exam. We concentrated on a variety of important & exam-relevant topics. To understand IPM (IIM-Indore) relevant topics comprehensively, this app provides very detailed and well researched information about each topic.

EduGorilla's IPM (IIM-Indore) mock test app aims to improve students' preparation by improving their time management and problem-solving abilities. EduGorilla's IPM (IIM-Indore) mock test app aims to maximize the preparation level of the student by enhancing their time management skills and problem-solving ability. Aspirants will find our IPM (IIM-Indore) mock test app to be the most effective for preparing for such a difficult exam.

Alerts & Notifications-
Get the latest alerts on Exam Notification, Admit Card & Results, etc. Start preparing for your desired exam today on our Mock Test App.

Contact Details-
